title: Amite Go-Consequences Simulation: Issac (2012)
description:
Amite LWI HEC-RAS Model results for Hurricane Isaac using AORC rainfall with Wind and Surge using an 8 segment downstream boundary informed by ADCIRC, and with upstream boundary conditions informed by HEC-HMS.

The structures inventory file is based on the USACE National Inventory Structures  (https://www.hec.usace.army.mil/confluence/nsi/userguides/download-tool 

All data paths are relative to the LWI S3 bucket with the root path being: LWI/Models/Go-Consequences/Amite

input_files.title: Amite Go-Consequences Simulation: Issac (2012) Input Hazard Layer
Amite Go-Consequences Simulation: Issac (2012) Input Structure Inventory Layer
input_files.description: The Go-Consequences Simulation Structure Inventory Layer.

output_files.title: Amite Go-Consequences Simulation: Issac (2012) Output Feature Layer
output_files.description: The Go-Consequences Simulation output feature layer.
